name: @sjcrh/proteinpaint-types
description: Shared type definitions between ProteinPaint server and client code

scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ENV=dev node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.prepack: tsx emitCheckers.ts && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node esbuild.config.mjs
